snippet: Every Saturday morning, Mary Anderson helps out at an equine therapy program for children with disabilities like impaired mobility, autism and blindness.
abstract: Mary Anderson volunteers with the Community Service Society of New York, working at New York Therapeutic Riding Center at the Chateau Stables on West 48th Street, which helps children with special needs.
lead_paragraph: Every Saturday morning, Mary Anderson helps out at an equine therapy program for children with disabilities like impaired mobility, autism and blindness.

headline.seo: Overcoming Her Own Pain to Help Disabled Children Ride, and Walk, Tall
headline.main: Retired, but Overcoming Her Pain to Help Disabled Children Ride, and Walk, Tall
headline.print_headline: Retired, but Overcoming Her Pain to Help Disabled Children Ride, and Walk, Tall
